MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL55 postcode area of Caernarfon, affecting properties in Trem Eilian and surrounding areas. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the repairs required to an underground cable fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7.00PM on 3rd December 2020.
